entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 26 March 2023
